sections.heading: Transfer of Powers and Duties of State Administrative Board to Administer Perkins Act to State Board of Education; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Department of Labor and Economic Growth Regarding Administration of Perkins Act for Secondary Students to Department of Education by Type II Transfer
